Package org.mrcp4j.server Description

Provides interfaces and classes for implementing MRCPv2 servers.

Package Usage

MRCPv2 servers can be implemented by registering a request handler implementation (see the org.mrcp4j.server.provider package for request handler interfaces) with an MrcpServerSocket via the appropriate openChannel() method call.

Related Documentation

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
  • MRCP4J Project Home
The latest draft of the MRCPv2 specification is available here.
